kirthi yoga yanu ardha kala sarpa yogayema awasthawaki.rahu ha kethu pihitada anshaka 180 thula ek paseka an grahayan sitima kala sarpa yogayayi.ek grahayaku pamanak anshaka 180n eha pihitima ardha kala sarpa yogayayi.anshaka 180n eha pihiti mema grahaya rawi ha sadu wana wita "rawi kirthi" ha "sadu kirthi " yogaya yede.rahu kethuge anshaka 180 n panna grahaya rawi sadu hara wenath grahayaku nam (thara grahayaku) ema yogaya adala grahaya namin "dipthi" yogaya lesa hadinwe.

balapitiya mulika rohale rogin bala ganimata katayuthu karana sanwidhanathmaka kandayam nisa rogin dadi apahasuthawata pathwa atha.me kandayam ek rogiyakugen mudal labagena thawath rogin kihipadenaku bala ganna bawath, mudal gath rogiyata awashya sewawa laba nodena bawath danagannata thibe.roginge bharakaruwangen wadipura mudal labagena rogiya langa nosita thawath rogin kihipadenek balaganna bawath danagannata atha.pradeshaye kappamkaruwanta kappam demin asarana roginta nisi sewawak laba nodi hithuwakkara ayurin katayuthu karana bawada wartha we.roginta hirihara nowana ayurin katayuthu karana lesa rohal baladharin kothek danuwath kalath eya sidunokarana me kandayam iwath karana lesada owuhu illa sitithi.me pilibanda saukhya baladharinge wishesha awadhanaya yomu karana lesada owhu wadiduratath illa sitithi..
namuth me pilibanda manawa himikam komasaristhumiya kisima piyawarak nogaththe ema marayin batahirata hithawath bawini.
